revised_title: Estuaries and Coastal Waters: A Discussion on Progress and Needs in Marine Science
tldr: This article discusses the importance of understanding the physical processes and mixing in estuaries and coastal waters. It focuses on the estuarine circulation, the influence of tidal currents, and the distribution of salinity and other properties of water. The author presents an example of an investigation in the Mersey estuary, highlighting the role of density currents, residual flow, and vertical mixing in these environments.
